s1.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to OFF position.
Check that transfer position indicators turn on for about 2 seconds and then turns off.

If any faulty condition is found, proceed to Transfer Position Indicator Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON but Engine Stops:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) or Transfer Position Indicator Remains ON Steady at Ignition Switch ON:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .
